Class FacadeServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.netcracker.serv.FacadeServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FacadeService

    @Component
@Service(value="facadeService")
@Transactional
public class FacadeServiceImpl
extends Object
implements FacadeService
    Implementing FacadeService interface. Connecting StudentService and GroupService in general class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hromenkov Ilya
